# socialrisk

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `socialrisk` is to create an efficient way to identify patient's social risk from administrative health care data.

## Installation

`socialrisk` is not yet available on CRAN.

The development version of `socialrisk` can be downloaded from [GitHub](https://github.com/WYATTBENSKEN/socialrisk) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("WYATTBENSKEN/socialrisk")
```
